game.title: The Quest for the Golden Star
game.objective: Find and return the Golden Star to fulfill the prophecy
game.description: A mystical journey awaits you to recover the lost star from the celestial mountaintop. Successfully complete this quest and earn the honored title of Guardian of the Stars.

task.description: Traverse through the shimmering meadows, avoid magical creatures, and locate the entrance to the Celestial Caves
Battle the guardian guardians and solve a celestial riddle to obtain the Golden Star
Convey your findings to the Star Guide at the Village of Stars
